title: Time I will never get back!
review: Absolutely AWFUL! I couldn't figure out what was going on throughout the WHOLE movie! What was up with the naked people? I didn't realize it was supposed to be horror movie until it was darn near over. The acting was absolutely horrific. My review is all over the place just like this movie!

title: What in the world?
review: Oh my goodness that was Absolutely AWFUL! Just...just... just...horrible!
